titleStmt.title: A letter from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, to Mr. Speaker; concerning, the forces of the Northern Association, and Nottinghamshire Horse joyning with the Army. With their severall declarations and representations. Also, two petitions from the Nottinghamshire Horse; the one to both Houses of Parliament; the other, to His Excellencie Sir Thomas Fairfax.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

titleStmt.title: A letter from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, to Mr. Speaker; concerning, the forces of the Northern Association, and Nottinghamshire Horse joyning with the Army. With their severall declarations and representations. Also, two petitions from the Nottinghamshire Horse; the one to both Houses of Parliament; the other, to His Excellencie Sir Thomas Fairfax.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: for George Whittington, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Blew Anchor in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
